item.title: [Final Dev|317] Help with client based things. [Galkons Base]
item.dc:creator: @XMikEIX XMikEIX
item.description:
@XMikEIX wrote:

Okay, theese are the things I need help with,

  1. Do you guys know what the color is called when you have 10M or more of an item? You know it turns blue, I wanna know what the color is called, i’ve searched for @cya@ @blu@ @gre@ in the client’s client.java, but I can’t find that one.
  2. You guys remember the old sprites for friend list, log out button, ignore list and so on? Can someone PLEASE upload them here so I can use them for my client.
  3. How to add dialogues to NPC’s on Final Dev 2.4 ? Is it same as DeltaScape?
  4. How to fix “You must wait 10 seconds before logging out of combat”, currently the code looks like this:
  5. How to remove hitpoints shown above heads. (Picture attached below)
public void logout() { stop(); for(Event e : server.eventsToAdd) { server.eventsToAdd.clear(); server.eventsToRemove.add(e); } for(Event e : server.eventsToRemove) { server.events.remove(e); } savegame(true); sendQuest("Click here to logout", 2458); println("Logout"); outStream.createFrame(109); }

–And

case 9154: // Log out logout(); break;

Really appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: [Final Dev|317] Help with client based things. [Galkons Base]
